name: Amazon - Browser Mobile App (Community)
description:
The name Amazon is inspired by the Amazon forest, implying that you would have a fresh and never-ending browsing experience. The app ui file includes trail version flows such as home, search, newsfeed, onboarding, setup, and a few others (Majority flows can be unlocked if you purchase the full version)

The file includes not just the UI screens, but also a style guide including colour palette, typography, iconography, and layout grids. Along with the style guide, there is a UI component library with properly set out components.
